components.label: Role

components.html: This form was completed by the responsible person in accordance with Sections 57 and/or 60.1 of the Contaminated Sites Regulation to notify the person or persons who own the neighbouring parcel(s) that one or more substances has migrated or is likely to have migrated to the neighbouring parcel and is or is likely causing contamination. A copy of this notification was also submitted to the Director of Waste Management. Note that affected parcel is defined as a parcel which is contaminated by the migration of substances from a neighbouring parcel. Please contact the responsible person to discuss the information provided in this notification.
components.label: Content

components.html: *All fields marked with an asterisk are mandatory.
components.label: Text/Images
HTML
components.content: Please enter the associated application ID (in case this application accompanies another application already submitted in the system).
